title: Game of Robot
content:
Here is a game, which I loved in my childness and I love it still today:
Game of Robot - [url=http://www.tom-games.de]www.tom-games.de[/url] (the Windows version is only on the German site: [url=http://www.tom-games.de/ger/download.htm]www.tom-games.de/ger/download.htm[/url])
You control a little green dressed figure through the rooms and you can find a lot of things there. The play process is not given. You must find out, how the things work. The are nearly endless ways to find the game end. Have fun! I try to make this game more popular outside Germany. The Game "Robot Junior" is FreeWare (the others are ShareWare). You can play this episode also good with only some German Knowledge. If not, here are some words:
Hilfe - Help, Spielstart - Game Start, Beenden - Quit, Benutzen - Use, Anschauen - Look, Ablegen - Placing, Verdoppeln - Double
Try! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

Does anybody know it? What do you think about it?

___
- We want "The Universe is Toast" ! - [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img]

title: Re: Game of Robot
content:
It'd be nice, translating German into and from a made up language is harder than it looks.

A sylable in German: Au; pronounced Ow, or Ou [as in outrage] Used in such neat little words as auf.A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society
